channel.title: CarPlay on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in CarPlay on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: iOS 26's Biggest CarPlay Feature Was Quietly Hiding on Apple's Website
item.description: Apple recently announced that iPhone users will soon be able to watch videos right on the CarPlay screen in supported vehicles. This is arguably the biggest new CarPlay feature coming with the iOS 26

item.title: iOS 26's Biggest CarPlay Feature Was Quietly Hiding on Apple's Website
item.description: Apple recently announced that iPhone users will soon be able to watch videos right on the CarPlay screen in supported vehicles. This is arguably the biggest new CarPlay feature coming with the iOS 26

item.title: Everything we learned from a week with Apple CarPlay Ultra
item.description: CarPlay Ultra takes over the main instrument display as well as the infotainment.
